statements: SELECT * FROM music_school_attendance
SELECT student_name, class_name, event_name FROM music_school_attendance WHERE student_id = 1
SELECT student_name, class_name, attendance_status FROM music_school_attendance WHERE event_id = 3
SELECT student_name, event_name FROM music_school_attendance WHERE attendance_status = TRUE
SELECT * FROM music_school_attendance ORDER BY class_id DESC
SELECT student_name, class_name, event_name, attendance_status FROM music_school_attendance WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM music_school_attendance WHERE class_id = 101 AND attendance_status = True;
SELECT student_name, class_name FROM music_school_attendance WHERE class_name LIKE '%Piano%' ORDER BY student_name DESC;
SELECT event_name, COUNT(student_id) AS total_attendees FROM music_school_attendance GROUP BY event_name HAVING COUNT(student_id) > 5;
SELECT DISTINCT student_id FROM music_school_attendance WHERE student_name IN ('Alice', 'Bob', 'Charlie');
SELECT * FROM music_classes ORDER BY class_name ASC;
SELECT class_name, class_capacity FROM music_classes WHERE class_capacity > 20;
SELECT class_id, class_instructor FROM music_classes WHERE class_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM attendance WHERE attendance_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT class_name, class_instructor, class_capacity FROM music_classes ORDER BY class_capacity DESC;
SELECT * FROM music_classes WHERE class_capacity > 20 ORDER BY class_name DESC;
SELECT class_name, class_instructor, class_capacity FROM music_classes WHERE class_capacity BETWEEN 10 AND 30;
SELECT class_name, class_capacity FROM music_classes WHERE class_instructor LIKE 'John%' ORDER BY class_capacity ASC;
SELECT * FROM attendance JOIN music_classes ON attendance.class_id = music_classes.class_id WHERE attendance_date = '2022-01-15';

SELECT class_name, class_instructor, COUNT(*) as total_students FROM music_classes JOIN attendance ON music_classes.class_id = attendance.class_id GROUP BY class_name, class_instructor HAVING total_students > 5 ORDER BY total_students DESC;
SELECT * FROM music_classes;
SELECT class_name, class_instructor FROM music_classes;
SELECT student_name, student_email FROM students;
SELECT * FROM attendance;
SELECT student_id, attendance_date FROM attendance;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, student_email FROM students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT a.attendance_id, c.class_name, s.student_name, a.attendance_date FROM attendance a JOIN music_classes c ON a.class_id = c.class_id JOIN students s ON a.student_id = s.student_id;
SELECT c.class_name, COUNT(a.attendance_id) AS total_attendance FROM attendance a JOIN music_classes c ON a.class_id = c.class_id GROUP BY c.class_name;
SELECT s.student_name, COUNT(a.attendance_id) AS total_attendance FROM attendance a JOIN students s ON a.student_id = s.student_id GROUP BY s.student_name ORDER BY total_attendance DESC;
SELECT * FROM music_schools;
SELECT school_id, school_name FROM music_schools ORDER BY school_id DESC;
SELECT student_name, class_name FROM students JOIN music_classes ON students.class_id = music_classes.class_id WHERE students.student_id = 1;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM events WHERE event_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT class_name, COUNT(*) AS total_students FROM students JOIN music_classes ON students.class_id = music_classes.class_id GROUP BY class_name ORDER BY total_students DESC;
SELECT * FROM music_schools;
SELECT school_name, school_id FROM music_schools ORDER BY school_name DESC;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM events WHERE event_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT s.student_name, c.class_name, sc.school_name FROM students s JOIN music_classes c ON s.class_id = c.class_id JOIN music_schools sc ON c.school_id = sc.school_id;

SELECT e.event_name, c.class_name, s.student_name FROM events e JOIN music_classes c ON e.class_id = c.class_id JOIN students s ON c.class_id = s.class_id ORDER BY e.event_date ASC, s.student_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, grade_level FROM students WHERE grade_level > 10;
SELECT event_name, location FROM events ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT class_name, teacher FROM classes WHERE teacher = 'John Doe';
SELECT student_name, grade FROM students INNER JOIN grades ON students.student_id = grades.student_id;
SELECT * FROM students WHERE grade_level > 10 ORDER BY student_name DESC;
SELECT class_name, teacher FROM classes WHERE schedule LIKE 'Mon%' AND teacher <> 'Smith' ORDER BY class_name;
SELECT student_name, grade FROM students JOIN grades ON students.student_id = grades.student_id WHERE grade > 90 ORDER BY grade DESC;
SELECT event_name, location FROM events WHERE event_date >= '2023-01-01' ORDER BY event_date ASC;

SELECT student_name, class_name, grade FROM students JOIN grades ON students.student_id = grades.student_id JOIN classes ON grades.class_id = classes.class_id WHERE grade_level = 12 ORDER BY student_name, class_name;
